    • CharacterCardHandler

      public CharacterCardHandler(Controller controller)

  • Method Details

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard()
      Play the Character Card, that the User selected before. Check if requirements are fulfilled. Spend Player coins. Activate card effect.
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • checkRequirements

      private boolean checkRequirements()
      Checks whether the generic requirements specified in the requirements attribute of each character card are met. Unneeded requirements are ignored even if previously selected
      Returns:
      true if the requirements are met.

    • checkCardSpecificRequisites

      private boolean checkCardSpecificRequisites()
      Checks character specific requirements
      Returns:
      true if the additional requirements have been fulfilled

    • selectCard

      public boolean selectCard(int idCard)
      Check if User can use this card and update Model to make visible the requirements of this card. When the UserInterface fulfill the requirements, can be called the method play card
      Parameters:
      idCard - > 0 && cardList.contains(idCard)
      Returns:
      true if the card could be selected

    • playableThisTurn

      private boolean playableThisTurn()
      Checks whether a character card was already played this turn
      Returns:
      True if a character card was already played this turn

    • canUseCard

      public boolean canUseCard(int idCard)
      check if Player has enough coin to use this card
      Parameters:
      idCard - must be contained in cardList
      Returns:
      true if Player has enough coin, false otherwise

    • correctId

      private boolean correctId(int idCard)
      check if a correct CardId is provided
      Parameters:
      idCard - > 0
      Returns:
      true if id is present in cardList, false otherwise

    • spendCoin

      private void spendCoin()
      Spend CurrentPlayer coins to use the card. Player ability to pay has been already check when this method is called

    • getIdFromPosition

      public int getIdFromPosition(Integer cardPosition)
      Gets the id of the character card at the position given
      Parameters:
      cardPosition - the position on the board
      Returns:
      the id of the card in that position or -1 if the position was invalid and the card not found

    • resetTurnRestriction

      public void resetTurnRestriction()
      Resets the played status for character cards for this turn

    • getUsingCard

      CharacterCard getUsingCard()
